info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 10:47PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF NORTHERN FAIRFIELD... PUTNAM...AND ORANGE COUNTIES... HAZARDS...An area of heavy snow. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1044 PM EST, an area of heavy snow was along a line extending from near Brewster to Chester and moving northeast at 15 MPH. Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches an hour, locally 3, can be expected across this area during the next hour. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Danbury, Newburgh, Middletown, Mahopac, Monroe, Lake Carmel, Walden, West Point, Goshen, Sherman, Brewster, Cold Spring, New Windsor, Brookfield, and New Fairfield. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
